DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate intubate condition use McGrath® VL Series 5 , without muscle relaxant
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Intubating Condition Mcgrath Videolaryngoscope With Without Muscle Relaxant
DOC.detailed_description: Thirty-four patient ASA classification I-II , require oroendotracheal tube intubation , study prospective , double-blinded , randomize , clinical trial . Anesthesia induce use fentanyl 1.5 mcg/kg , xylocaine 1.5 mg/kg propofol 3 mg/kg . Patients randomly assign one two group receive either rocuronium 0.6 mg/kg saline intravenously . The Mcgrath® VL intubation initiate 90 , patient fully relax . The primary outcome compare tracheal intubating condition two group . The secondary outcome success rate first attempt intubation , time intubation , require propofol dose intubation anesthetic complication . Statistical analysis perform use R program version 2.14.2 . The level statistical significance set p < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Age 1865 year old . ASA class III . Elective surgery require general anesthesia oroendotracheal intubation Suspected know difficult airway . Patient risk aspiration require rapid sequence induction . Plan remain intubation . Allergic drug use study . Renal hepatic disease .
